details: ABC News investigative unit inquiry about Epstein's connections to Trump and Clinton
Matthew Mosk, ABC News producer, seeking background on presidential candidates

public_knowledge.context: Epstein's connections to high-profile political figures were widely reported, especially during the 2016 presidential campaign when Trump was a candidate

analysis.summary: Michael Wolff advises Jeffrey Epstein that ABC News is investigating his connections to Donald Trump and Bill Clinton as part of presidential candidate research, warning that as Trump's campaign gains momentum, media scrutiny will increase and Epstein needs a strategic response.
